operation.command: update BGEN.CIVILP set ETANP = 'LEPOISSON', ETAPRE = 'Aquaman' where ETACAF = '02018000007994'
select 1 from sgengpp.gpp_personne_physique p where p.numero_interne = 2018000007994 and nom_patronymique = 'LEPOISSON' and prenom = 'Aquaman'
